751830.name: ENDLESS™ Space 2 - Target Locked Update
751830.description:
The free “Target Locked” update introduces the highly-requested Fighters and Bombers which adds an extra layer of awesome to the Endless Space 2 battle sequences. You’ll now see your smaller ships whooshing past huge cruisers and ripping those biggies’ hulls apart! But that’s not all, we’ve given a ton of extra love to the battles with bigger explosions, additional planet destruction cinematics, new tactical cards, and a new quest that will introduce a “pirate” heroine Endless Space players will recognise and new players will love!

The Target Locked Update includes


  • Fighters and Bombers that are finally here to rip those huge cruisers' hulls apart.

  • Fighters and Bombers dedicated battle tactics and squadron support modules.

  • A new quest involving the mysterious Mavros and a rogue assembly line.

  • Jennifer Rach, a new pirate heroine returning from the first Endless Space.

This update also includes numerous visual enhancements such as bigger and civilization based explosions, additional planet destructions and a new Unfallen main menu scene.
751830.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
